titleStmt.title: A correct copy of some letters written to J.M., a nonconformist teacher concerning the gift and forms of prayer by Matthew Hole ...
titleStmt.author: Hole, Matthew, 1639 or 40-1730.
J. M. (John Moore), 1641 or 2-1717.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Chauklin ... and are sold by R. Knaplock ...,

notesStmt.note: Part 2 with title: Letters written to J.M. a nonconformist teacher, concerning the gift and forms of prayer. The second part ... London, 1699 is lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
